short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that helps you to capture your two weeks thoughts in this historical situation called Covid-19.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***It replaces your new tab with shiny UI to capture your thoughts amid Covid-19 while you at home"***

It has been a few days since I was doing Work from Home and I had many thoughts floating around Covide-19 situations. I have witnessed Swine Flu and Covid-19 pandemics declared by W.H.O. This time I'm more aware of the situation and impact. 

All the Governments across the world is taking unprecedented steps amid the Covid-19 outbreak. I'm so aware about situation that the former line uses two new buzzwords.

I thought I will write my thoughts in a diary and realized that I can make a Chrome extension. It will be interesting and helpful to read thoughts across the world.

*Note: "14Days" developer supports Privacy by Design very strongly. There is NO tracking or analytics script is in this Chrome extension. Your data is in your computer and under your full control.*

[Features âœ¨]:

1. Every day you see a box to share your thoughts.
2. You squeeze your thoughts in a single SMS size or 160 characters.
3. After 14 entries, the app will no longer accept entries.

What to do after 14 days? You sit back and relax.
You share the screenshot with the world with your thoughts using #14DaysThoughts and mention @knowkalpesh in the Tweet (because I'm excited to read them).
